revised_title: The Non-Coincidence of the Focus of Photogenic Rays with That of Visual Rays in Achromatic Object-Glasses
tldr: M. A. Claudet investigates the focus adjustment in the Daguerreotype process and discovers that the focus of photogenic rays is not coincident with the visual focus in achromatic object-glasses. By adjusting the focus according to the nature of the lens and the intensity of light, the author achieves perfect delineations of objects.
